snippet: The Day: Emanuel Azenberg, a producer who will receive a Tony Award for lifetime achievement, said: "You have to live a lifetime to get a lifetime. But the acknowledgment is good."
abstract: The Day: Emanuel Azenberg, a producer who will receive a Tony Award for lifetime achievement, said: "You have to live a lifetime to get a lifetime. But the acknowledgment is good."

headline.main: For a Broadway Producer, a Time to be Acknowledged
